page.title: 02Equestrian Centre-Stanton
page.content: Mr.Duffield built an{indoor riding {school}in 1981 for the winter months for his children to ride.Mr.Creaton, the manager,told us how it grew bigger. There are twenty stables that they use in winter and there are about thirty horses which they use but some people bring their own. In summer they have most of their lessons outside,but in winter they always have them inside. They are hoping that in the future they will have two or three day shows.People travel miles and miles to come,some from Wales,Scotland and the other side of London.People come to them to do their{British Horse Society {Award}which is a twelve month course.This Summer they will prepare a team for the{Horse of the Year Show.
